snippet: Three Ethiopian journalists and six bloggers were charged with planning terrorist attacks during a court hearing in Addis Ababa on Friday morning, nearly three months after they were arrested.
abstract: Three Ethiopian journalists and six bloggers are charged with planning terrorist attacks during court hearing in Addis Ababa, nearly three months after they were arrested.
lead_paragraph: Three Ethiopian journalists and six bloggers were charged with planning terrorist attacks during a court hearing in Addis Ababa on Friday morning, nearly three months after they were arrested.

headline.main: Ethiopia: Bloggers and Journalists Are Charged as Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia: Bloggers and Journalists Are Charged as Terrorists
